comments:
build I20040317

While doing a sync, I got the following.
This must be on the check for the value (the element), not the key (the item).
This is bizarre, since when updateChildren gets the list of child elements, the
array is checked for null elements (in getRawChildren).

Is there any possibility that this array is getting modified concurrently?

The only possible NPEs are if the table is null or if the object being sent to 
it is null.

Checking the code the former isn't possible as the table is set before the 
input is (as speced) so it look like there is a null entry being sent to the 
table.

But this is checked for in getRawChildren's call to assertElementsNotNull, which
is why I asked if there could be a concurrent modification to the array of child
elements.  But on a cursory glance through JobTreeElement and friends, this does
not seem possible.
*** Bug 56970 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Marking P5 as it is likely this view will disappear before M9 to be replaced 
by a view using progress indicators.
This view is not shipping in 3.0
